md.name: descriptive
md.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/" xmlns:dcterms="http://purl.org/dc/terms/"><dc:title xsi:type="dcterms:cs">Filmová hudba, její záznam a zpracování</dc:title><dcterms:translated xsi:type="dcterms:en">Film music, its record and process</dcterms:translated><dcterms:alternative></dcterms:alternative><dcterms:alternativeTranslated></dcterms:alternativeTranslated><dc:studyID></dc:studyID><dc:creator>Horák, Ivan.</dc:creator><dcterms:dateofbirth></dcterms:dateofbirth><dc:subject></dc:subject><dc:description xsi:type="dcterms:en">This dissertation essay concerns film music, its recording and processing. The work concentrates on the synthesis of the music with the film picture and on the choice of the right tools that lead to their successful combination. It also touches a selected technical aspects of music recording and its processing. It chronologically describes the creation of the film music from the beginning till the final phase: the final mix. Analysis of the audiovisual samples represent an important part of this work. These samples show what are the possibilities of an artificial electronic music as well as of the orchestral music combined with the electronic instruments.</dc:description><dc:publisher> Univerzita Karlova v Praze </dc:publisher><dcterms:advisor>Zobač, Jíří.</dcterms:advisor><dcterms:advisor>Ďurovič, Juraj; konzultant</dcterms:advisor><dcterms:referee></dcterms:referee><dcterms:created>2006</dcterms:created><dcterms:dateAccepted>7.6.2006</dcterms:dateAccepted><dc:status></dc:status><dc:type></dc:type><dc:format xsi:type="dcterms:IMT">application.pdf</dc:format><dc:identifier></dc:identifier><dc:language></dc:language><dc:rights></dc:rights><dcterms:name></dcterms:name><dcterms:level></dcterms:level><dcterms:discipline></dcterms:discipline><dcterms:grantor>Akademie múzických umění. Filmová a televizní fakulta AMU. Katedra zvukové tvorby</dcterms:grantor><dc:collection>dp</dc:collection><dc:collection>dp</dc:collection></record>
